info.name: CRM API - ITEMS
info.description:
Welcome to the CRM API.

Contact Support:
 Email: hello@apideck.com

header.description: (Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

query.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
(Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

response.name: Unauthorized

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
(Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

response.body:
{
  "status_code": 401,
  "error": "Unauthorized",
  "typeName": "UnauthorizedError",
  "message": "Unauthorized Request",
  "detail": "Failed to generate valid JWT Session. Verify applicationId is correct",
  "ref": "https://developers.apideck.com/errors#unauthorizederror"
}

response.name: Payment Required

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
(Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

response.body:
{
  "status_code": 402,
  "error": "Payment Required",
  "typeName": "RequestLimitError",
  "message": "Request Limit Reached",
  "detail": "You have reached your limit of 2000",
  "ref": "https://developers.apideck.com/errors#requestlimiterror"
}

response.name: The specified resource was not found

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
(Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

response.body:
{
  "status_code": 404,
  "error": "Not Found",
  "typeName": "EntityNotFoundError",
  "message": "Unknown Widget",
  "detail": "Could not find widget with id: '123'",
  "ref": "https://developers.apideck.com/errors#entitynotfounderror"
}

response.name: Unprocessable

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
(Required) ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from
(Required) The ID of your Unify application

Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). [See the full list in the connector section.](#section/Connectors) Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

response.body:
{
  "status_code": 422,
  "error": "Unprocessable Entity",
  "typeName": "InvalidStateError",
  "message": "Invalid State",
  "detail": "State did not include unified_api",
  "ref": "https://developers.apideck.com/errors#invalidstateerror"
}
